intro: Monechma ndellense, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Gesneriaceae family and is characterized by its velvety, dark green leaves and showy, tubular flowers. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments and thrives in well-draining soil. It is popular as a houseplant due to its ornamental value and ease of care. Monechma ndellense is known for its ability to bloom throughout the year under proper conditions.
